title: Silca uncorks next ‘Small Batch’ Ti Bottle Cage & Straw kits, Dynaplug tools get Meerkat Magic
content:
Some call it frivolous, some call it fun, but there is plenty of room in the cycling industry for finishing touches and adornments that add personal flair to our prized two-wheel steeds… or tool kits! If you’re a fancy lad or lass you might be familiar with Silca’s titanium bottle cage and straw kits. If […]

The post Silca uncorks next ‘Small Batch’ Ti Bottle Cage & Straw kits, Dynaplug tools get Meerkat Magic appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Steve Fisher
